description:
In 19th-century London, class lines are sharply drawn, and the social standing to which people are born dictates the path their lives will follow. Emma, an honest and hardworking young maid, never felt her place in life to be a burden. But then she met William, a member of the gentry and the eldest son of a wealthy family. His warm smile and earnest affection threaten to capture her heart... but can love truly conquer all?

(Source: RightStuf)

node.description:
__Likes:__ green, genmaicha, ferns, action films, Tokyo, classical and French music, documentation books about history. 

Created doujinshi about British maids before her debut under the penname Fumio Agata as member of doujinshi circle *Lady Maid*.

Started to draw in high school. Her first work was Emma. She refers to research and academic theses for her work. In 2005, she received an "Excellence Award" from the Japan Media Arts Festival for her manga "Emma." In 2012, she received a French award "Prix intergénérations du festival d’Angoulême" for her manga "Bride Stories."

Mori's works are known for their high level of detail of clothing, historical nuances, and background work. Her books are often published outside Japan in larger, hardbound editions in order to complement the heavy detail seen in every page.

[Website](http://ryokunihiko.com/)

Started taking piano lessons at age of 5. Attended in medical college about 3 years. From 1984 to 1985 he worked in a Tokyo hospital. After that he moved back to musical career. In 1996 he made his first solo album “The Gate Of Dreams”. 1998 second album “Into the Light”. “ONLY HEAVEN KNOWS” in 1999. 4th album “Pan-O-Rama” 2001. 2004 5th solo album ECHOES. He also made sountracks to DEAD HEAT,Emma,The Twelve Kingdoms and many more.
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

node.description:
Works regularly with [Studio Pierrot](https://anilist.co/studio/1/).

_Note: Not to be confused with the [painter from Studio Pierrot](https://anilist.co/staff/213833) or the [other animator](https://anilist.co/staff/150897/) by the same name._
Michiyuki Honma is a planner and producer.
_Note: not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/169408/)._
Kaoru Saitou is a planner and producer. He was born in Tokyo. In 1977, he graduated from Keio University and joined TBS.

__Eiko Morikawa__ is a Japanese sound effects editor. She started working at Swara Production, then went to Rakuonsha, and now is the representative director of Chura Sound.

(Source: AniDB)
